bill.title: Board of Medical Licensure; revise authority under several statutes.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 73-43-13, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Require That The Executive Director Of The State Board Of Medical Licensure Be A Physician; To Amend Sections 73-43-11, 73-25-29 And 73-25-30, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Authorize The Board To Discipline Licensees By Fining Them; To Amend Section 73-25-53, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Authorize A Physician's License To Be Restricted Or Suspended Under The Disabled Physician Law For Disruptive Behavior; To Amend Section 41-29-159, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That The Board Is Responsible For Regulating And Checking The Legitimate Drug Traffic Among Physician Assistants; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Public Health and Human Services
